main event: Tribesmen saw flying saucers trailing bluish flames roaring across the evening skies of Quetta.
interesting points: The sightings occurred on two successive days,The flying saucers illuminated an area of 30 to 40 miles radius,Reports mentioned that similar objects were seen above Karachi months earlier,The objects were described as 'flying saucers' by local tribesmen,The event was reported in 'The Times of India' on November 19, 1952.
